item.description:
Two Ravens Kindred is hosting a Pubmoot!

We're gathering on Sunday, October 10, 2010 (hey.10/10/10!) at Delaney's, a tap room/restaurant in the Westville neighborhood of New Haven, Connecticut. We'll meet starting at 4:00 PM. There are two 'sides' to Delaney's. One looks like a typical college bar - wooden booths, pool table, etc - we will not be there. We'll be on the restaurant side, either at a large table in/outside or up in the smaller "bar" area attached to it. Look for the hammers around the necks; that's usually the best sign.

PLEASE RSVP so that we can get a head count to make a reservation with. You can always drop by and we'll pull up a chair, but if we have a clue how many people are coming, it helps to start off!

First timers, old timers... all are welcome!!!

For more info and directions:
Delaney's Tap Room

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: TRK Pubmoot
